eventsData.description: The 2016 United Nations Climate Change Conference was an international meeting of political leaders and activists to discuss environmental issues

Formal meeting in which many people gather in order to talk about ideas or problems related to a particular topic (such as medicine or business) usually for several days.
The first known use of conference appears in 1527, meaning a meeting of two or more persons for discussing matters of common concern
